item.title: Lancelot claims Rose De Bahama Cup
item.author: Racing Correspondent
item.description: Lancelot ridden by C.S.Jodha won the Rose De Bahama Cup, the main event of the races held here on Thursday (March 6). The winner is owned by Royal Knight Racing Syndicate. Faisal Abbas trains the...

item.title: Emperor’s Crown wins feature event
item.author: Racing Correspondent

item.title: F-1 will not return to India in 2015: Ecclestone
item.author: PTI
item.description: The 2014 race was dropped from the calendar due to bureaucratic hurdles even as the official version was that it was scrapped due to logistic reasons.

item.title: Sedition charges against Kashmiri students dropped
item.author: Omar Rashid
item.description: Around 60 Kashmiri students at Swami Vivekananda Subharti University hostel in Meerut were expelled for three days for allegedly supporting the Pakistan cricket team against India in the Asia Cup.

item.description: Bangladesh frittered away a solid start as Sri Lankan spinners triggered a middle-order collapse to restrict the hosts to 204 for nine in an inconsequential Asia Cup match on Thursday. Ro...
